sentences.sContent: And yet, in many ways, Socrates diagnoses very powerfully an important condition of modern democratic life with which we are all familiar.
sentences.sContent_eng: And yet, in many ways, Socrates diagnoses very powerfully an important condition of modern democratic life with which we are all familiar.
sentences.sCn: 但在很多方面，苏格拉底却也诊断了,非常有力且重要的,现在民主生活条件,那是我们都很熟悉的。
